and to copy the western nations we call abstinence using veil an outdated thing as a result of blindly following culture regard purdah virtuousness concepts furthermore in footsteps declare abstention old fashioned on top that while imitating west condemn prayers pardah over all by copying world are declaring religious think if wont follow modernism considered thinking man whats more mimicry countries have started consider piety moreover worship backward veiled be will like veils oldfashioned
